BEGIN.name: Welcome to 'ESCAPE FROM THE MERIDIAN', a text adventure game
BEGIN.desc:
In order to begin, type: START 
If you ever need to quit the game, type: QUIT

DECK.name: Deck
DECK.desc: You are on the deck of the pirate ship 'The Meridian'. There is not a soul left on this forsaken vessel. There does appear to be a life boat left behind.

items.desc: A Boat left behind. It was not of use to them but may be yet of use to you
items.take: You bring the boat on the deck of the ship. You should be able to access it whenever.

MAST.name: Crows Nest
MAST.desc: You are atop the mast in the Crow's Nest. You can't make out much but around you is a spyglass.

BOW.name: Bow of the ship
BOW.desc: You are at the front of the ship, watching as the waves break against the wood. There are some devices about that you may be able to interact with.

CROOM.name: Captians Quarters
CROOM.desc: These are where the Captian kept his personal affects and would sleep during the night. There are various trinkets and items lying about.

HELM.name: HELM
HELM.desc: You are on the back of the ship where the steering wheel is located.

CREWR.name: CREW'S QUARTERS
CREWR.desc: You are below deck, where the crew slept. The place apears thourghly ransacked but you still may be able to find some things

CANNONR.name: CANNON ROOM
CANNONR.desc: You are bellow deck where the cannons should be kept for battle. Most appear broken or disassembled.

MUNITIONSR.name: MUNITIONS STORAGE ROOM
MUNITIONSR.desc: It appears you are where the storage for the ships munitions. There is nothing out of the ordinary here or so it seems

PRISION.name: PRISION ROOM
PRISION.desc: You have found the room where traitors and captured individuals were stored. The cells seem locked and inside you can see those who met and unfortunate end.

BOTTOM.name: BOTTOM OF THE SEA
BOTTOM.desc: You have drowned and met your fate.
